attributes.action: Equal  EU Health Treatment for those living abroad..
attributes.additional_details:
Currently a British tax payer living(but not working ) in an EU country and paying tax and NI in Britain is not entitled to EU Health Treatment if living, but not working in another EU country. This is unfair,as full treatment would be available to a Briton working and living abroad in the EU..

We petition the Government to cover all UK tax payers for basic Health Treatment in the EU zone when they live in one of the countries,but are not working there.
